title: Apps want to disconnect from a non-existent VPN?
content: I just got a new Pixel 4a (5g) the other day, and I am almost done installing and setting up my apps, games, etc. Several of the games I play pop up a warning to disconnect from my VPN, but I am not using one. After triple checking my settings, I have confirmed there is not a VPN connection. The warning still pops up, how can I remedy this?
